attributes.action: Final referendum deciding whether the UK leaves the EU with no-deal or stays in.
attributes.additional_details: To ensure a proper democratic process and outcome for this very important issue.
attributes.background: In the event of a no-deal Brexit - have a final referendum to seek voters approval for the UK to leave the EU without a deal or to stay in the EU  if no deal is reached.
